channel.title: VenomousGameCreation needs Coders
channel.description:
Hello, as the CEO of VenomousGameCreations, i have taken on a task, I am gonna be leading a Team of HARDCORE coders to create a Java based Game. WE will be based off of RS2 Servers, and Clients. We will totally remaster them into a BRAND new game called Mob3 World. If you have experience in Coding, either Servers, and or Clients, Please PM me or post here. Thank you for reading this. Pay will be Moderator/Administrator Privelages on the site, with FREE items every week/month. WE will be adding new maps, monsters, weapons, and ect. Once again we are REMASTERIng RENAMING, regraphicing it, and everything. WE will basically rebuild this game. We will try and get this to be as different as runescape as possible, if we have to and or are warned by Jagex PErsonally VIA Phone, and or email, I will post pone this till we get it aside. I believe this is 100% legal as we are changing everything, renaming, and giving Jagex Credit where do.
Application:
You need to be atleast 13+ to work, as our staff is only 14 i think.
Application:
Name: Age: Previous Experience: Hardcore Coder: How Long have you been coding: IF asked to make a WHOLE new monster up with Working code can you: Can you make Maps: Additional information: Comments: When is the best to start/work: Previous Administration/Moderator on Runescape Based games: Are you good with Model Making:
**Unofficial Application may change.***

Additional information: None needed

When is the best to start/work: Anytime.
Previous Administration/Moderator on Runescape Based games: Yes, servers only.
Are you Good with model Making: Yea… It’s easy.

item.title: VenomousGameCreation needs Coders

item.description:

New Application!
Name: Adnan
Age: 15
Previous Experience: Well I have created a custom maze. Syi Blocker. 31 Shops. 2 Mingames. 1 Quest.
Hardcore Coder: On a scale of 1to 10 I would say 8.9999
How Long have you been coding: 9 Months
IF asked to make a WHOLE new monster up with Working code can you: Err… Maybe
Can you make Maps: No.
Additional information: I have coded 3 servers and 3 official Source realeses of mine and Atm working on a source.
Comments: Hi?
When is the best to start/work: Whenever you want. Except on Monday and Thurdays at 6:00 P.M. - 8:00 P.M. (Soccer)
Previous Administration/Moderator on Runescape Based games: Yes
Are you good with Model Making: Kinda Not So Experienced With It.

item.title: VenomousGameCreation needs Coders
item.dc:creator: @VenomousGameCreation VenomousGameCreations
item.description:
@VenomousGameCreation wrote:

Tobias, this is a FULL game, not just a server, we will need java coders. I do NOT know coding, i only know little, Also i am CEO of VenomousGameCreations and we are MAKING a game BASED off. I do not know coding, it doesnt have to be exact. I am hiring. If you want to ‘Flame’ me for posting here and trying to get people who acually know how to do crap, then go ahead. This is why i frown upon Mopar. Also, we are testing things out on 503, 317, ect. We are totally remastering a client. It will look nothing upon Runescapes (We hope) How ever a server i currently adminstrate has asked me to get a 503 client and remake it for them, how ever to do so, i will need a working compiler, the ones my friend handed me did not work :S. Any help would greatly apreciated, and no flaming please.

ALSO, i never said i knew alot of coding, i know some.

Read full topic

item.title: VenomousGameCreation needs Coders
item.dc:creator: @wasabiie wasabiie
item.description:
@wasabiie wrote:

Name: Tyler
Age: I am currently 16.
Previous Experience: I’ve had my share with server sources.
Hardcore Coder: No.
How Long have you been coding: Around 2 weeks of actually coding.(Not RSPS-)
IF asked to make a WHOLE new monster up with Working code can you: Customizing a monster and adding its ints to a client; sure.
Can you make Maps: What do you mean ‘maps’? But Gimmme a day an I’ll have it down.
Additional information: I’m a very fast learner.
Comments: I’m interested in this greatly.
When is the best to start/work: Friday.
Previous Administration/Moderator on Runescape Based games: This is not needed as being an admin on a RSPS does not mean yo can code; But I would say, Admin on Enkrona is the only proud one I could think about, everything else was some shitty leeched server. I’ve owned, coded(more like edited) and hosted about 5 servers since 2007.

Read full topic
